text:
P.S. Someone recorded Snowden dropping the mic after criticizing Sunil for his pressure tactics.

https://t.co/WAaA6pKwC3

After thinking about this, I hope there is a fundraiser to replace any money he ends up losing over refusing to support this huckster.

Against my better judgement, I stayed on.

One of the guests (Angelo, who is onscreen) -- after a minute long fumble of "he who laughs last, laughs best" -- just suggested that Sunil "consider legal action" against Snowden unless he comes back on to apologize. https://t.co/o5erqyXcxN

The crew is still going for some reason and are being extremely repetitive. If I ever hear these people speak again it will be too soon.

Anyway, long story short, the real VIP today was Snowden's friend who called him up and informed him about Sunil's pressure tactics.

/ https://t.co/CP7Ib5J03r
Sunil is making one last pitch for people to pay the $47 to "come by tomorrow [for the VIP room]...spend three hours with me...it will be at another level". https://t.co/I6L8VHc6Y6
Sunil: "We were snowed in today...*applause"...This is not going to slow me down or my plerking." https://t.co/1ONl5g43n6

The Lomiko Metals founder says he might use today for "a chapter in his book".

"This has nothing but a positive impact on my involvement in what you guys are doing." https://t.co/VrN2v52fWb

Sunil is telling his audience to stop the negative comments about Snowden because he "wants to take things to the next level". 

Daniel Char is now arguing that even negative attention "can be turned back to positive...Once you start growing you get targets on your back." https://t.co/WntuuVZ6f7

"At the end of the day, we're all business people...Someone giving you a one-star review [read: getting banned from securities for a Ponzi schme] shouldn't ruin your whole business...And it's very honorable that Sunil is still standing up." https://t.co/3fZR8a6udk

"I guess this answer the question of whether Snowden was really coming today."

Daniel Char is now arguing that Snowden should have Google-searched Sunil before coming on.

Again, I think complaint was over VIP pressure tactics today, not 2017 article. https://t.co/14pWRD1uN6

Daniel and his colleague are talking about the Ponzi scheme coverage of Sunil and PIC and asserting "we're good people" and "questioned Sunil about the article".

They are repeating the talking point that, because Sunil continued using the PIC brand, that is proof he is ethical.
Daniel Char is back and suggests that today was a "curveball" and all they can do is "pivot" and continue to give the audience "value". https://t.co/A3SBgGfrEU

As is pointed out in the article -- and which jives with the above-mentioned "you could find the money if you had a gun pointed at your head" arguments -- Sunil's ban was partially due to his "high pressure sales tactics".

Here is a 2017 article describing the fraudulent sales / "Ponzi scheme" Sunil Tulsiani had with members of the Private Investment Club that left him banned from securities sales in Ontario.

https://t.co/onfgNhI0vD https://t.co/9Nf1F4AQUv
Everything went on break and now Eye of the Tiger is playing. https://t.co/9uE1NHzgR2

Sunil -- for about the twentieth time -- is pointing out that he didn't change his business name after the securities fiasco in 2008. "I used to be a detective...If someone does something wrong they leave" https://t.co/ylS0Mg0HTg
The Q&A with his audience is still going on and Sunil is trying to turn this on Snowden to say him changing his mind was the problem. https://t.co/Ebbi5fEuWy
Sunil says -- perhaps quoting one of the commenters -- that he thinks it might have been a well-planned setup.

My understanding was that Snowden's complaint was about the pressure tactics ('you could find the money if you had a gun to your head') on paying for the $47 VIP room and not the securities history. But I guess it is a sore spot.

Sunil just read a comment that pointed out that he sounds like he is about to cry. "This is in the past...Security was defined by the way the paperwork was done. I'm here. I wouldn't be allowed to do this if I was charged criminally" https://t.co/j41pKpupvC
"I want you to know that I'm pretty smart, and if I wanted to disappear I would have. I did not change my name or the name of the company." https://t.co/9BmzOxnNV9

"[Snowden] just left. We could have had a conversation...I get it...I'm still here guys...People who do things...they're the ones who leave...I have the same phone number...same office. I've changed lives. Some of you are those people." https://t.co/bGxtRqzK54
"How silly do we have to be to not know this? We're talking about Greg Cardone...Robert Allen...he knows...Kevin Harrington, he knows. They know." [presumably about the securities past]
Sunil then got everyone to do a group high-five. "If you have any questions, I'll answer your question." https://t.co/OEqrDQa04x
Sunil says it was a big mistake that he didn't hire a security lawyer in the past. "This happened in 2008...They needed somebody to blame. I learned from my mistakes." https://t.co/DwLv4JVqGX

"If I stole millions of dollars I would not be here...I was never charged criminally...The article says 'man named', not that he did it. That articles talks about securities and all that kind of stuff."

"You are not numbers to me." https://t.co/Qh1kuFWDUM
Sunil is now asking everyone whose life he helped to say so in the chat box. https://t.co/SgUIGgLWTF
Sunil is back and saying that the problem is that someone wrote a "clickbait article". https://t.co/ClzKOz6K2U
The person with the hot mic apparently just ordered a "medium iced coffee" at a driveup window. https://t.co/RLEAc7eZr4
Someone with a hot mic that doesn't know it just said "Wasted fucking day" https://t.co/w9x9Zbek6P
The video is still on break while they figure out how to respond. https://t.co/rO1Bg3fWse
Extreme respect to Snowden for calling out the host on this.

Oh my god. Snowden just said he wasn't comfortable continuing and said goodbye.

Sunil just replied with "wow". https://t.co/16qXpGJb6g

Snowden says that a friend reached out to him about this conference and mentioned the moment of Sunil pressuring someone to pay for the VIP room even if he couldn't.

Snowden says the things he heard made him uncomfortable.

I'm wondering if it was reference to my above tweet https://t.co/gZmoN6zjLE
"Sometimes the person we're waiting for is us." https://t.co/WaxwnD54co
"this gets us to whistleblowing and ethics..." https://t.co/OdXKAHcR7n

The first question was how accurate Oliver Stone's Snowden movie was.

Snowden pivots quickly and says "this is an unusual audience..I was excited to have this conversation...on this idea of how [wealth works for and against us]." https://t.co/wUbei9JHW5

And we're back. Sunil is introducing Snowden as a former CIA officer that is Pres. of Freedom of the Press.

There are some mild audio problems. https://t.co/bAHDz5ulUM
The big question here is where Snowden's friends and support network were on this. Surely someone looked into who he was selling his name to.

"We're going to have a twenty minute break...and then have Edward Snowden in the house...I want you to be inspired to take action on the things you haven't yet...Build the relationship with the person you haven't...Kill that virus 'I can't afford it'"

This is awful. https://t.co/Y8BE6oZVEl
"[Private Investment Club] is not a learning club, it's a doing club...Today we have the most elite real estate investment club in North America." https://t.co/5uQP8p6uFK

"What does [Snowden] have to do with business? Ethics has *everything* to do with business. I'll tell you how I started Private Investment Club. I left the police force and...finally I came into real estate. Ethics is so important to me." https://t.co/LW4SdM9Z4m

"If you donate $47 you'll get a coin and a book...which is worth like $60...I don't take a million dollar salary and then send the money to them..."

"First you give, and then you get."

In between telling people who clearly don't have any money that they should find a way to pay him $47, Sunil is bragging about how much of a philanthropist he is and how he helped 150 people in India get eye surgery.

"If you donate $47...you can have any book...any audio book" https://t.co/6wsnLW8Q8i
I just want to say that telling people they should find a way to pay for something even if they don't have the way to pay for it is cult shit that I grew up hearing in an unnamed church.

"By the way, Snowden is about to come. It's going to be at 4pm [ET]."

"Amanda says she can't afford the VIP...Amanda: try. If you had a gun to your head you could find a way...We're going to try to figure out how to get you in, but figure out how to get the $47"
"It's absolutely a no brainer to be part of [the VIP tomorrow for $47]. Snowden is about to come."
"If you're looking for money, be there tomorrow at the VIP" [which costs $47]
"I'm not a teacher, I'm a do-er."
This whole webconference is like a gameshow where the audience is constantly milked for money under the guise of "self-investment" with continual breadcrumbs that Snowden is coming up soon.
"It's always a VIP experience with Sunil."

Sunil is again pitching the $47 access to the "VIP" room tomorrow, along with the coin and audio book. He is continually referring to paying him money as an "investment in yourself".

"In the past people paid $500...$1000...to be part of Mastermind." https://t.co/xGerUyy2w5
"It's not the content, it's the con*text* and access to relationships and opportunities"

Sunil is namedropping Oprah and describing how he had put her on his vision board before meeting her "not once but twice...I've shared a stage with Tony Robbins...Brian Tracy...Kevin Harrington...some of the most amazing speakers on the planet"

"Now I'm a 7x best-selling author"
More breadcrumbs that Snowden is coming up soon. https://t.co/n7tRpJqMiX
"Kayla has been giving me so many kisses. Derek gave me a heart, which I will accept."
"If you're a woman right now you can send me flying kisses...Guys...you can just hold back on the kisses." https://t.co/1Ub8ScQXb1
Sunil just gave away a bunch of $30 coins and gift certificates to the audience so that people could no longer say they'd never won anything. https://t.co/ZMvEoWuXmH

"If there was a gun to your head saying you have to find  ten thousand dollars...you'll find it."

"I want you to take action when you're not ready." https://t.co/D8qtTiDLwd

Sunil is now namechecking Tony Robbins and talking about how to go from excellent to outstanding.

"If you believe in the higher power...God wants one thing for you...you actually doing the part...I truly believe in The Law of Attraction..." https://t.co/Znwhev8K2k

The audio worked this time and promised that the actual conversation will be in another two hours...

"We're not going to put up Edward Snowden's photo all over the place if he isn't coming...He's coming. Please, just maybe...I can't tell you the exact time but it's coming soon" https://t.co/OajfdFjesS

The Snowden shoutout had technical problems and no audio.

Sunil says he needs to give away more gifts in the mean time.

And...*of* *course* he is pitching Deepak Chopra's new book now. (Chopra also participated in Salesforce's Dreamforce) https://t.co/6GHgA8WuwD
"We're talking about Tony Robbins...people that grow you...and the other books are *how* to do this. That's the content..." Knowing how to make the deals, "that's the context"

This is some galaxy brain shit.

"Content is important, but context is 100 times more important...Grow your context..."

"The content is a tractor trailor in front of you [on the highway]...context is the ability to automatically move out of the way" https://t.co/ePWsnPbsSC
Sunil was humble enough to mention that he is now at the very top of Maslow's hierarchy and points out that most people are a few levels down. https://t.co/gerhDy8BM8
A wild Maslow's hierarchy appears. https://t.co/JfrIZOEJd6
Sunil is now promising that he will play a short 30 second "shoutout" from Snowden confirming his later participation. https://t.co/BWG5PH7ndd
Char closes with a plug for his "totally free training" and promises Snowden is soon. https://t.co/Uj4qs49Afl
I zoned out for a minute and came back to this. https://t.co/Pjx5QbSszN
Oh. Nevermind. https://t.co/kJVbCjLIZS
I continue to hold out hope that Snowden had no involvement in any of this and that his interview is an empty promise to get people to sit through these grifts.
Here is the "Daniel Char Wealth Cycle". https://t.co/Y38kplHhb6

Daniel is explaining that there is no tax on the sale of a property if you lived in it for at least a year and showing off his gross profit. All while waving around his stack of cash. https://t.co/hnLhaq0AC8
https://t.co/JQKyWuzzcx

I wish I caught in a snapshot, but Daniel threw a bunch of the (fake?) money in the air as he explained that this approach is "ethical" and "legal" and recommended taking out high interest rate loans. https://t.co/33dqT5EtG0
Daniel is waving a fat stack of cash around as he speaks. https://t.co/c7X672o6Vq

(Fake?) money just rained down as the next speaker -- Daniel Char (sp?) -- just walked out to talk about buying real estate with "no money down".

Daniel makes a point of clarifying that this is *not* a scam. https://t.co/61oq3CNldu
"How many of you want to plerk? PLERK. PLERK. PLERK. PLERK. You're plerking. You're plerking...Colin: you want to plerk? Tareen: you want to plerk?" https://t.co/2gzJsfBqqC
Sunil says the plate of his car is PLERKING -- for play/working -- and hopes everyone "plerks for the rest of their lives". https://t.co/CWwSsVymfA
Sunil is selling two other books alongside Snowden's and injected a brag about how he makes $5000 / hour when consulting with clients. https://t.co/7BBeIpZJvb
"Who wants to win it?...You got it...You got it...You got it..." https://t.co/h49attsAHv

Sunil is now talking about giving away a signed copy of Snowden's book.

"Who wants to win it? Show me in the chat box."

Sunil then mentions Snowden's NFT being worth $5M and says signed book might not be worth that. https://t.co/Segp4B74qK

One of sponsors is Lomiko Metals (https://t.co/DLJEvFEb5z) and founder told story about defending migrant workers in court who were told to apply for EI instead of getting paid and compared it to what Snowden did.

This is only person so far who seem to have a bit of genuineness. https://t.co/r17Qy7imU4
Sunil was having everyone who bought his "gold notes" for $200 flash them on the screen. https://t.co/X9FK7rh94g

Cordone's overall pitch is explicitly geared towards why even struggling people should pay Sunil thousands of dollars for "access" to wealthy people if they want to become wealthy themselves. https://t.co/4nyZTEiLIR

The host, Sunil Tulsiani, is chatting w/ Grant Cordone, who is recommending people stay in expensive hotels and drink coffee at most expensive places they can find bc that's where the best ideas are.

And "commit to the future" by paying as much as you can to the host for seats. https://t.co/WeKVgITsH6
The host, Sunil, is now asking everyone in the chat to tell him "how much they love me". https://t.co/tMXUWgUcR0
LOL. "Someone is very upset about Ed." https://t.co/tDHicXglm0
"Please stop asking what time Ed is coming on." The host says "for security reasons" he can't say, and that the event is all about business. https://t.co/FcP3rHVL17

The host is currently selling a package deal of $30 for a challenge coin, a Secret to Success audio book, and access to the "VIP" room. "It's going to be life changing for you." https://t.co/5Fc5a8YzWM
The host is now going through the list of 'millionaires' minted through his PIC program, with Snowden's picture scrolling through the back. https://t.co/An97RpnoZ1
"If you guys are not interested in money, this seminar is not for you." https://t.co/Zqvn68tn5V
"How many of you want to earn one to ten million in the next year?....Me me me me me" https://t.co/RhSQSwwZVL
The room is currently dancing over "Who wants to win this $100 bill?" https://t.co/3OMvkIHlZx

WTF. Didn't Freedom of the Press just get like $5M through an NFT? Surely Snowden shouldn't need to resort to hucksterism.

I am sitting in the Zoom right now and it's as bad as it sounds. https://t.co/QjdnnA5ia3 https://t.co/eZOdpEuMkn

Snowden is slated to speak at a real estate seminar today (https://t.co/nEHCpZhcMG), & the run-up is full of "raise your hand if you want to be rich," exclusive "secret gifts" for signups (today only!), "my purpose in life is to create enlighten entrepreneurs," etc. https://t.co/E5NwKArnee
